LanguageData.TimberRattler.label: timber rattler
LanguageData.TimberRattler.description: A small predatory snake. Timber rattlers can be highly aggressive if provoked, and their bite injects toxic venom into the victim.
LanguageData.TimberRattler.tools.venomfangs.label: venom-fangs
LanguageData.TimberRattler.tools.head.label: head
